website_summaries.verdict: Tape is easy to tear with one hand, and it stays on well during contact sports and high-impact use.
pros: Hypoallergenic and latex-free for sensitive skin
Thin and comfortable for a good fit
Adheres well to gauze and pre-wraps
Popular with athletes who wrap feet and ankles
cons: Not very stretchy, and some reports of difficulty removing from skin
Some athletes, including fighters, feel support is insufficient

customer_reviews.title: Sticks well but non-stretching
customer_reviews.text: Love that this tape is so easy to cut—because it is so annying having to carry a pair of scissors to deal with tapes that are impossible to cut. The issue I have is that this tape doesn’t seem to stretch at all, so the use is quite limited. If I use it in places like ankles and wrists, it severely limits my range of motion. If too much force gets applied, the tape would eventually come off, which would mean that I must apply more. I’ll definitely finish all of the rolls I’ve purchased and I won’t be returning them, but I’m not sure if I’d buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Santo Esmeraldo

customer_reviews.title: Great Skin Removal Product
customer_reviews.text: My son used this to protect his feet for Taekwondo training. His skin came off with the tape. So, be careful when you remove it. We will not be using it again.
customer_reviews.author: J. Temple

customer_reviews.title: Great product.
customer_reviews.text: My daughter uses this to wrap her hands and wrists everyday for her J.O. Gymnastics practices and it stay one for the 4 hours of practice everyday. So I will definitely purchase more when she runs She loves it because it is so easy to tear apart doesn’t need scissors to cut it when she’s putting it on herself. Worth every cent.
customer_reviews.author: Mark LaPlante

customer_reviews.title: Thin, Strong, Flexible, Adheres Well
customer_reviews.text: This tape is better than "Coach Sports Tape" in the following ways: It's thinner and more comfortable. It's more flexible, and bends better with your skin. It Adheres better to you skin. All this, without loss of strength.
customer_reviews.author: Ron Rahav

customer_reviews.title: Will order again
customer_reviews.text: As someone who struggles with plantar fasciitis, taping makes all the difference! So glad I found this product - it's easy to tear and there's plenty of it. Tape definitely adheres to the skin and stays put - since it's on the bottom of my feet it's little sensitive to remove it. I think if I were taping an ankle or shoulder it wouldn't think twice about removal! Great product, thank you.
customer_reviews.author: Sara J.

customer_reviews.title: Great Tape for CrossFit!
customer_reviews.text: I am a CrossFit athlete and I struggle to find good quality tape that will stay on during a lot of barbell cycling and highly dynamic movements. This tape is perfect - it stays on without bunching, but also comes off easily and doesn't leave a glue-ring around my fingers. It is also wide enough that I can tear it in half for smaller areas (fingers) or leave it wider for larger areas (ankles on rope climbing day). I realize most people don't get super excited about good tape, but this one is the unicorn of athletic tape for me!
customer_reviews.author: Patti Sperline

customer_reviews.title: Light adherence
customer_reviews.text: I was really looking forward to use it on my feet for plantar fasciitis pain, but didn't adhere well, and didn't provide the relief expected.
customer_reviews.author: Alessandra G.

customer_reviews.title: Help for Tendinitis in the Foot
customer_reviews.text: I have tendinitis in my foot and it feels better taping it.. Lessens the pain. Foot specialist showed me how to tape it and I have been using a heavier gauge tape. This is actually less heavy than I'm used to, but it still does the trick. Great product.
customer_reviews.author: Sue Obenauer

customer_reviews.title: Not easy tear
customer_reviews.text: This tape ID NOT EASY TEAR. I cannot tear it without first making a cut with scissors. It does come off painlessly which is nice and doesnt leave sticky residue. Unfortunately it also doesnt stick all that well. Overall I am disappointed and I think there must be a better choice.
customer_reviews.author: Sherry Buckowing

customer_reviews.title: Saved me a lot!
customer_reviews.text: Needed athletic tape asap for a vaulting competition (gymnastics on horseback). We wrap handles on our barrels, use for temporary armbands for competitors who needs it (sticks to spandex nylon unitards and comes off without harming), wrap weak wrists and ankles, etc. Since our local drug store charges way way too much per roll was happy to find these online and next day delivery! yahoo!
customer_reviews.author: Carolyn Conner

customer_reviews.title: Great for blister prevention
customer_reviews.text: My son is a competitive tennis player and sometimes gets blisters on his hands. We usually put a band aid over the blister and wrap another layer of Athletic tape over it until it heals. Then we use the tape to protect the new skin for a week or two. This has been a great brand of athletic tape. It sticks well. It's easy to tear and easy to pull off when you need to. We are going to stick with this brand from now on.
customer_reviews.author: John Nguyen

customer_reviews.title: The GOOD stuff....
customer_reviews.text: I have used a lot of tape in the past 30 yrs...in the GYM..some injuries..minor stuff..This is the good tape that's worth every penny spent..YOU won't be sorry you bought it !! (Strong,stays put,easy to remove) THE GOOD STUFF
customer_reviews.author: wbill

customer_reviews.title: Good price, fast shipping.
customer_reviews.text: The tape was delivered quickly and it was good quality.
customer_reviews.author: JOYCE GLEASON

customer_reviews.title: Difficult to unroll
customer_reviews.text: TApe very difficult to unroll. May have been too long in warehouse. Functions fine after you get it off roll but will really slow down taping
customer_reviews.author: Dangerboy John

customer_reviews.title: Great subduing a vampire
customer_reviews.text: As i said in the headline, great for subduing vampires and many other types of undead menaces. Just simply lightly spray with holy water, enough to wet it but not enough to loosen the glue. And laugh as the struggle with all their unholy undead might and fail to break free of their silly tape bonds. lol. Great for a good time with friends and so much easier to carry then bags of heavy chains and ropes.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It grips and sticks without leaving residue behind
customer_reviews.text: This tape has helped ease my foot pain from Plantar Fasciitis while I work out and walk. It sure has helped me get more exercise without pain and the morning after pain.
customer_reviews.author: Beth W

customer_reviews.title: Sticks well but can be hard to put on.
customer_reviews.text: This tape sticks pretty well to you and to itself, and you get a lot of it for the price you pay! I've found it difficult to put on if I accidentally roll too much out, because it folds over and sticks onto itself. Honestly, I'd recommend just getting some velcro wraps to save time and money.
customer_reviews.author: Evan

customer_reviews.title: Great Tape -
customer_reviews.text: Like the ease of tearing the tape. I have to apply daily and I don’t usually have scissors close by. This tape is strong and lasts all day on my ankle. Gives me the support I need. Great product and great price!
customer_reviews.author: Chance

customer_reviews.title: Solid As Hell
customer_reviews.text: Check this out, been boxing about two months, got some peeling on the skin and have been looking for athletic tape. Yeah, this stuff is legit, for I would think all applications. Good deal at this price, will buy again
customer_reviews.author: Matt hayden

customer_reviews.title: Great for taping ankles
customer_reviews.text: This tape is easy to tear and very durable. Used to tape my daughters ankle and she was able to play soccer free of pain with the support of the tape and not have further injury
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good tape. Not easy to tear.
customer_reviews.text: Good tape. Not overly sticky. Definitely not easy tear though.
customer_reviews.author: andersg

customer_reviews.title: Does the job
customer_reviews.text: Good tape, does the job. Just wasn’t as “sticky” as I wanted it to be and my wraps would start to unravel. But overall, still good tape and cheaper than many others.
customer_reviews.author: KimTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Quick delivery
customer_reviews.text: Just arrived. They seem fine but it’s odd that they were delivered in just the product box, anyone could’ve opened it. ( The small blue box in picture)
customer_reviews.author: SharAK

customer_reviews.title: Good, decent tape
customer_reviews.text: Good quality tape that is easy to rip off at the spot that’s needed. Sticks well and lasts for a while. Could be a little more affordable considering competitors pricing
customer_reviews.author: Dino Turkic

customer_reviews.title: Easy to rip!
customer_reviews.text: This tape has been so much easier to use than others. We have soccer players in the family so there’s a lot of taping ankles. It’s wonderful and also easier to remove. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: SuziQ66

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for hardcore sports.
customer_reviews.text: BEST TRAINING TAPE HANDS DOWN!! I have spent so much money on tape, but they all start to loosen after 30 minutes of training, but not these. These go through the whole 2 hours of hell with me and do not budge at all. Only tape I will be buying.
customer_reviews.author: Kelvis Machado

customer_reviews.title: Not real athletic quality
customer_reviews.text: It’s not Johnson and Johnson quality, bought to wrap and ankle and wasn’t worth it for that. Works well for wrapping fingers for workouts
customer_reviews.author: Richard

customer_reviews.title: fit
customer_reviews.text: tape is a little too stiff. great value for the money.
customer_reviews.author: nathan kurisu

customer_reviews.title: Great price and product
customer_reviews.text: Great price compared to buying one at a time. We go through a lot of tape for two daughters in gymnastics
customer_reviews.author: Rob V

customer_reviews.title: Adherence ok, value good
customer_reviews.text: Not quite as sticky as it should be but otherwise held up pretty well for my son’s ankle during soccer practice.
customer_reviews.author: JGourlay

customer_reviews.title: Quality product!
customer_reviews.text: I have purchased this tape a number of times. The adhesion is just perfect and not overly sticky. It easy to come off the roll unlike others which requires extra strength to pull off. I will absolutely continue to be a repeat customer!!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Right Combination
customer_reviews.text: I use this to tape my fingers for Olympic weightlifting workouts. It is super easy to split and apply. The tape has just enough flexibility for the fingers and it is easy to remove after the workout. I will buy this tape again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Easy to tear. No stickiness.
customer_reviews.text: I use it when I train Brazilian Jiu Jitsu. The tape is very easy to tear. No stickiness when you try to remove it from your finger. Very good product and great price!
customer_reviews.author: Sean

customer_reviews.title: exactly as advertised
customer_reviews.text: i bought inexpensive athletic tape, it was exactly what i ordered
customer_reviews.author: GNS3

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: After having tried many athletic tapes this one is the best quality for the most reasonable price. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Brie Gorman

customer_reviews.title: Not enough like fabric
customer_reviews.text: Doesn't stretch and support as well as other tapes that I have used for sprained ankle/ankle support.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: The product arrived in a very timely manner and I love it.
customer_reviews.author: Alan e little

customer_reviews.title: It works well.
customer_reviews.text: I'm glad I bought it and I'd buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: DrGeorge

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I coach basketball and have to tape a lot of ankles, this is really good tape easy to tear of with no twisting.
customer_reviews.author: Jacob Bishoff

customer_reviews.title: Great for soccer- sticky and durable
customer_reviews.text: Just as good as any other athletic tape I’ve found for taping ankles, toes, etc.
customer_reviews.author: Tom E

customer_reviews.title: Good quality. Holds up well
customer_reviews.text: My kid (16) plays soccer and loves this wrap for her injured ankle
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Athletic Tape that Works
customer_reviews.text: This tape is the best. I use for taping my wrist for golf and it is very durable stays in place and the adhesion is great in any weather
customer_reviews.author: James A. Equals

customer_reviews.title: Of all the tape for my daughter's gymnastics, this is the best.
customer_reviews.text: My daughter is a level 10 gymnast. She had a grade 3 sprain to over come this year. I went through 4 different kind before I tried this one. She loves it and it works the way it is supposed to. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Dru8Razzor

customer_reviews.title: Easy tear quality tape
customer_reviews.text: Easy tear!!!! First brand we bought we had to use scissors and it was horrible and took too much time. This tape is easy to tear and makes quick work of taping my kiddos ankle. Also this tape doesnt come unraveled while ripping like some. Will purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Emily Stahl

customer_reviews.title: Great  Tape
customer_reviews.text: Mu husband uses this tape to wrap his ankles and after trying several brands, this one out performs all the others.
customer_reviews.author: Di Winfield

customer_reviews.title: Great tape, Great value
customer_reviews.text: This is really great for both medical purposes and for finger taping (used for BJJ and it sticks very well). Best thing is that there's not residual glue like with other brands, other than that it tears easily with the fingers so no scissors needed. Great product for a great price!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Sticky but doesn't stick well
customer_reviews.text: I was excited to get this product and use it. Even though it is sticky, it does not stay very well.
customer_reviews.author: Dragonrule029

customer_reviews.title: Terrible Product- DO NOT BUY
customer_reviews.text: This very expensive tape DOES NOT STICK. And is much thinner then normal athletic tape. If I could give a zero star rating I would. Waste of my money.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Elwood

customer_reviews.title: Great product.
customer_reviews.text: This is a really good quality product, the price is the best I’ve found, highly recommended, I play soccer quiet competitive and need to protect my feet from injuries, so far the quality is very high.
customer_reviews.author: Irwin Cruz

customer_reviews.title: works really well.
customer_reviews.text: I use on my injured BJJ toe and holds really good...reccomended for sure
customer_reviews.author: jeff christiansen

customer_reviews.title: It adheres well
customer_reviews.text: I use this to tape my foot and ankle. It adheres well until I remove it.
customer_reviews.author: Maureen Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Great for jiu-jitsu!
customer_reviews.text: Use this tape for jiu-jitsu everyday. Love it! Great quality sports tape!
customer_reviews.author: Cruzcontrol39

customer_reviews.title: skilled players best friend
customer_reviews.text: Best roll of athletic tape. Great to wrap up ankles for support during aggressive football games. Best for running backs, receivers, etc.
customer_reviews.author: User1980

customer_reviews.title: Tape up my fingers for BJJ
customer_reviews.text: I like the serrated edge which makes it easy to tear to length.
customer_reviews.author: Randmfg

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: Sticks great. Easy to year and works well for taping taping gauze on a wound for my dog
customer_reviews.author: Melany

customer_reviews.title: Adhesion was a bit of an issue
customer_reviews.text: I used it to tape my ankle, it would be helpful to know that it should be used with something under it to keep it from having to be removed quite painfully.
customer_reviews.author: John F Guinan III

customer_reviews.title: No scissors required if you are travelling
customer_reviews.text: It is an easy tear tape but maybe because of that it is very thin and not as supportive in my opinion
customer_reviews.author: Jay Lehr

customer_reviews.title: Gotta use under tape
customer_reviews.text: Unlike Rigid tape, this irritated my skin. gotta use under tape.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel

customer_reviews.title: Won't order again since price was greatly increased
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product several times in spite of periodic issues with lifting at the end and uneven tearing, primarily because of the low price. I won't order again since they have greatly increased the price.
customer_reviews.author: Gantrobus

customer_reviews.title: good quality - arrived fast
customer_reviews.text: good quality - arrived fast, but a little on the expensive side
customer_reviews.author: Johnnypromo

customer_reviews.title: Solid easy rip pathetic tape: White
customer_reviews.text: Ample volume of tape roles, rips easily and sticks to clean skin as well. Leaves no obvious residue.
customer_reviews.author: Lawrence Mayer

customer_reviews.title: Don't use it on back..
customer_reviews.text: I was trying to use this for my back physio therapy. I'm not sure it's product issue or it's just me, this started to give me rashes on my back. I had to switch to cover tapes.
customer_reviews.author: Gokul V.

customer_reviews.title: Strong Adhesive
customer_reviews.text: No residue easy to remove adhesive strong professional use yes. Easy to use, no bulk sleek.
customer_reviews.author: tamo

customer_reviews.title: Wish more companies would offer this
customer_reviews.text: It does what it is suppose to do. No need for scissors.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew Chung

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for taping sports injuries.
customer_reviews.text: This was exactly what I was needing. The product is exactly what was described.
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany Cagley

customer_reviews.title: Works great.
customer_reviews.text: Used it for taping up an ankle. Not overly sticky, but sticky enough to do the job. Tears easily, at the edge, when you need it to.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: 1 1/2" is a perfect width
customer_reviews.text: I use this tape to wrap my foot because of heel pain. It works perfectly! Though I don't leave it on over night due risk of skin irritation.

customer_reviews.title: sticks well
customer_reviews.text: it works great I have damaged wrists and use it to work out.

customer_reviews.title: I liked this product.
customer_reviews.text: I did like this product, once I use them up I will order again. I used it on my foo6.

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use and quick to arrive
customer_reviews.text: Honestly the best tape I've personally used. Would recommend any day! 👌

customer_reviews.title: Came quickly
customer_reviews.text: The product is great and we needed tape rather quickly. Came on-time as promised!
customer_reviews.author: german

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for what I needed
customer_reviews.text: Great for hand tears. Exactly the texture and flexibility I was looking for.

customer_reviews.title: Great tape
customer_reviews.text: Simple to remove from roll and apply. When removing, the adhesive washes off easy.

customer_reviews.title: Best bang for your buck
customer_reviews.text: Can't complain, lots of tape for the price and easy to tear and use. Adds a lot of protection for hook grip .

customer_reviews.title: Non irritating
customer_reviews.text: So far product performs well. I do not have an irritation like I was left with from other tapes.

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: We use this product to keep my son's night time braces on at night.

customer_reviews.title: Not all pieces were in the package
customer_reviews.text: The site/package said 8 rolls of tape. Only received 6 rolls of tape.

customer_reviews.title: It works!
customer_reviews.text: Arrives on time, does what I need it to do.

customer_reviews.text: I bought this product to help support my wrist when I bowl.

customer_reviews.title: Spat up the cleats with up
customer_reviews.text: We spat my kid's football cleats with it. Works perfectly
customer_reviews.author: Michael F

customer_reviews.title: Great tape especially for the purpose why I use it.
customer_reviews.text: I play percussion musical instruments and being a diabelic I must make sure that my fingers are protected at all times. In playing bongos and congas I have to wrap my fingers like a boxer, if not my finger can get cut up and I don't want to end up in the hospital. I'm sure these tapes were being used in various ways, but now you can use my experiences to all for the use for musical instruments as well. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: ffsalsa/ff

product_meta.title: White Athletic Sports Tape (8-Pack) - Easy Tear Zigzag Edge with No Sticky Residue, Hypoallergenic, Latex Free, Easy on Skin – Used by Pro Athletes and Coaches -1.5” x 10 Yards
product_meta.description:
Get the Most Out of Your Training without the worry of getting injured!

Regardless if you are jogging or training, there should never be a time for injuries.
Although it is normal to hear complaints like sprained ankles, body pains, and pulled muscles.
luckily, these problems can be avoided with our high-quality sport activity tape.

📏 Be Protected at All Times!
There are lots of athletic tapes available on the market today.
However, none of them can offer the same level of protection for muscles like our tape, by keeping the muscles firm and strain free.
And because it can be used to hold training equipment in place, such as knee pads and other gears,
you are confident that nothing will go wrong during your entire training session.

Product Features:
✔ Used by Professional Athletes, Trainers and Coaches
✔ High-Grade Cotton cloth tape
✔ Hypoallergenic: Free of Latex
✔ Easy Tear - No Scissor
✔ Durable and Versatile
✔ Package includes: 8 Rolls
✔ Dimensions: 1.5” x 10 yards

⭐ Aesthetically Appealing!
With the increasing demand for durable tapes in the athletic field, various tape products have been created for specific uses.
Surprisingly, despite the growing number of taping options to choose from, athletes still prefer athletic tapes with aesthetic appeal, but can provide muscle support.
Therefore, it comes to no surprise why this athletic tape has become such a big hit!

💲 Get The Most Value for your Money!
Stay in shape during your athletic training by getting this 8 pack FlexTrek Sports Tape.
no matter what your sport is, you get to enjoy a winning outcome and value for money.
Does that sound like a great deal? I Know!

Provide added support for your body to prevent injuries to wrists, fingers, ankles, and knees.

Purchase this FlexTrek Sports Tape today by clicking the orange button above and keep yourself moving smoothly throughout the day!
feature_bullets: VERSATILE ZIG-ZAG DESIGN, EASY TO TEAR - FlexTrek Sports Tape features a new and improved versatile sticking zig-zag design and can be used in many different ways. From wrapping the fingers to taping the ankles, this product comes with an easy to follow instruction guide.

HYPOALLERGENIC & LATEX FREE - Our very own sports tape, which is highly recommended by many athletes, goes easy on the skin while providing enough strength to protect your joints. That only means you can train with comfort and style!

FIT FOR ALL - Whether you are an aspiring athlete, a professional sports player, a personal trainer, or a fitness coach, this self adhesive wrap is the product for you. Not only is it smooth; it is also very reliable, ensuring minimal irritation and less rubbing. It’s indeed a vital tool for players to be able to stay healthy and perform at their optimal levels.

INJURY PREVENTION - Best used when training or during recovery from muscle fatigue caused by boxing, gymnastics, tennis, football, basketball, rugby, weightlifting, baseball, hockey, and other sports, this injury proof tape should help protect your body from injuries on or after heavy activities and sports.

UNPARALLELED BODY SUPPORT WITH SUPPORTIVE GUARANTEE - This FlexTrek Sports Tape is, by far, the most reliable athletic tape available today. But if you think it doesn’t meet your requirements, please inform us right away. Do know that our team is always willing to help you with your concerns because we aim to provide only the best and high-quality products to keep you happy and satisfied.
